inspo.quote: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.
inspo.author: Albert Einstein

inspo.quote: As you think, so shall you become.
inspo.author: Bruce Lee

inspo.quote: Happiness is a choice and a skill and you can dedicate yourself to learning that skill and making that choice.
inspo.author: Naval Ravikant

inspo.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
inspo.author: Mother Teresa

inspo.quote: It is under the greatest adversity that there exists the greatest potential for doing good, both for oneself and others.
inspo.author: Dalai Lama

inspo.quote: Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.
inspo.author: Og Mandino

inspo.quote: Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
inspo.author: Mark Twain

inspo.quote: Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.
inspo.author: Celestine Chua

inspo.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
inspo.author: Dr. Seuss

inspo.quote: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
inspo.author: Brian Tracy

inspo.quote: Growth comes at the point of resistance.
inspo.author: Josh Waitzkin

inspo.quote: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
inspo.author: A.A. Milne

inspo.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
inspo.author: Anne Frank

inspo.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
inspo.author: Babe Ruth

inspo.quote: I wasn't brave, I just didn't have time to be scared.
inspo.author: Amelia Earhart

inspo.quote: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
inspo.author: Ralph Marston

inspo.quote: Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.
inspo.author: Zig Ziglar

inspo.quote: Every experience is a lesson. Every loss is a gain.
inspo.author: Sathya Sai Baba
